location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of communications from the Resident, dated 21 December 1818 and 5 January 1819. It notes that the Governor of Bombay has concluded that all necessary measures to prevent the Joasmee [QawƒÅsim] from settling on the island of Kishime [Qeshm] will have been taken.
